General.Text: Police Pilot required for a prisoner transport
Drive to the ~g~airport~s~, the plane is already waiting!

Agent.Dialogue: ~y~You~s~: Hello, I'm a pilot from the police department, what do we have here?
~b~Agent~s~: Good day, we have a high risk prisoner here, and will be transported to North Yankton.
~b~Agent~s~: We have this private jet here, the prisoner is already in there.
~b~Agent~s~: Please fly to the destination, which will be on your navigation system, you can't miss it.
~b~Agent~s~: Police will be there waiting for you. Have a good flight!
Get in the plane & fly to the ~o~destination~s~.

Officer.Dialogue: Fly to the ~o~destination marker~s~ on your minimap.
~b~Officer~s~: It might be a little cold out here & the streets are slippery...
~b~Officer~s~: The suspect is already sitting in the vehicle.
~b~Officer~s~: Please drive to the ~g~prison~s~ marked on your GPS with our police cruiser.
Get in the vehicle & drive to the ~g~prison~s~.
Drive to the ~g~prison~s~ marked on your gps.
